Documentation¶

Takes a chart and constructs an image from it using pillow

All images provided in rsc/images/skins/ must be of the same size. Yes, even holds.

class reamber.algorithms.analysis.playField.PlayField.PlayField(m: Union[reamber.osu.OsuMapObj.OsuMapObj, reamber.o2jam.O2JMapObj.O2JMapObj, reamber.sm.SMMapObj.SMMapObj, reamber.quaver.QuaMapObj.QuaMapObj], durationPerPx: float = 5, noteWidth: int = 10, hitHeight: int = 5, holdHeight: int = 5, columnLineWidth: int = 1, startLead: float = 100.0, endLead: float = 100.0, padding: int = 0, backgroundColor: str = '#000000')¶

Bases: object

export() → PIL.Image.Image¶

Just grabs the image without modifications. I recommend exportFold to make it more squarish

exportFold(maxHeight: int = 2000, stageLineWidth: int = 3, stageLineColor: str = '#525252') → PIL.Image.Image¶

Exports by folding the image :param maxHeight: The maximum height of the image, the lower this is, the wider the image :param stageLineWidth: The width of the stage line separator :param stageLineColor: The color of the stage line separator :return:

HOLD_RESIZE_BUFFER: int = 2¶
